title: Improve UIMA UpdateRequestProcessor performances by providing UIMA-AS support
description:
The current implementation uses in memory mechanism for instantiating UIMA pipelines.
Allowing the use of the UIMA-AS based instantiation can help much on improving performances and lower latency of text processing.
